attributes.action: Get universities to re-consider cancelling graduations for the classes of 2020.
attributes.additional_details: The government hold the power in changing universities approach to cancelling graduation ceremonies
attributes.background: I want the government to help us dispute the decision that universities have made in regards to completely cancelling 2020 graduation ceremonies. With the governments help we could urge universities to re-consider cancelling graduation and to postpone it to an appropriate date this year.

rejection.details: The arrangement of graduation ceremonies is a matter for individual universities, and not the Government or Parliament. You should contact your university to see what arrangements they have made for graduation.
